title: Font ID Please
content:
Any ideas on this font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Calavo\_Logo\_Scan.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090625154148/http:/typophile.com/files/Calavo_Logo_Scan_0.jpg) | 157.65 KB |
author: hijinx

comments.content:
I didn’t have much luck finding anything with an ’a’ that matched this. It seemed most like some Bodonis, but the rest of the letters weren’t very close.

- Mike Yanega
